rules_text: Put target creature on top of its owner’s library. That player may scry 1.
notes:
!new !spoiler8
!v0.2 
Name: Impulsive Mistake —> Veil of Indecision
Text: Return target creature to its owner’s hand. If that creature was tapped, you may put it on top of its owner’s library instead. —> Put target creature on top of its owner’s library. That player may scry 1.
